title: Make gradient name text solid color

requirements.text: Remove the gradient styling from the name text in HeroSection and replace it with a single solid color. The element to modify is the second span within the h1 tag (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/h1[1]/span[2]). Use a warm, readable color that maintains good contrast against the background.

quotes: I want this to be one solid color

acceptanceCriteria: The name text displays in a single solid color instead of a gradient
The color maintains sufficient contrast for readability
Only the selected span element is modified

constraints: Only modify the styling of the second span element in the HeroSection h1 tag
Do not change the text content or structure
nonGoals: Modifying other gradient text elements on the page
Changing the overall color scheme of the site
